mapper.insert: INSERT INTO party (sno, bplc_nm, writer, title, content, max, file_name, upload_path) VALUES (#{sno}, #{bplcNm}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{max}, #{fileName}, #{uploadPath})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, s.rdn_whl_addr, s.uptae_nm, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM partylike l WHERE p.party_no = l.party_no) AS likeCount FROM party p JOIN store s ON p.sno = s.sno ORDER BY party_no DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{cpp}
SELECT p.*, s.rdn_whl_addr, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM partylike l WHERE p.party_no = l.party_no) AS likeCount FROM party p JOIN store s ON p.sno = s.sno ORDER BY likeCount DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{cpp}

SELECT p.*, s.rdn_whl_addr, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM participants WHERE party_no = #{partyNo}) AS attended_num, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM participants WHERE party_no = #{partyNo} AND user_id = #{userId}) AS attended, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM partyLike WHERE party_no = #{partyNo} AND user_id = #{userId}) AS is_like FROM party p JOIN store s ON p.sno = s.sno WHERE p.party_no = #{partyNo};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM participants WHERE party_no = #{partyNo} AND user_id = #{userId}
